{"title": "Don't Fall Off", "title_search": "dont fall off", "title_keyword": "dont fall off", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/dont-fall-off/", "summary": "Rollie really loves to travel. He’s on a boat (a little paper boat, that is). The problem is, he can’t get wet! The clock’s ticking! Move Rollie’s vessel and keep him dry so he can visit Greece, India, Japan and Australia! This casual game from Inlogic Software combines cool physics, tricky obstacles, and fun power-ups for quick and addictive pick-up-and-play. DON’T FALL OFF!2 WAYS TO STEER YOUR SHIP Rollie is no square, so can fall right off the edge. In Novice mode, use the accelerometer to keep him from rolling right into the water. {"title": "Empires (2011)", "title_search": "empires 2011", "title_keyword": "empires 2011", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/empires-2011/", "summary": "WITH EMPIRES, REDISCOVER THE GAME OF CONQUEST.
